narrative: Explore this in-depth profile to find out about poverty, population, education, health, water, sanitation and hygiene, and district public resources in {props.entity.name}.

Explore this in-depth profile of ${props.entity.name} to find out overall levels of poverty, income distribution, division of wealth and more. Discover how national and sub-national revenue is generated.
